message: I plead with you, my family is in dire need of resources. We have a surplus of X, but we don't have enough of Y. My children are starving and we desperately need your help. I am willing to offer you some of our X resources in exchange for your Y resources.

received_message: I plead with you, my family is in dire need of resources. We have a surplus of X, but we don't have enough of Y. My children are starving and we desperately need your help. I am willing to offer you some of our X resources in exchange for your Y resources.
message: I accept your proposal. I hope this helps your situation. We're in this together.
